comment: Afew years ago , Emirates and flydubai found an opportunity to widen their customer base by offering passengers easy transfers at DXB between the two airlines . Today almost % of passengers reported poor service whilst travelling on flydubai flights . Time for a rethink ! <URL>
amr:

                                    :ARG0 a
                                    :ARG2 (p / passenger)
                                    :ARG3 (c4 / company

                                                :op1 "DXB"))
                                    :ARG1-of (e / easy-05))

            :time (b2 / before
                  :op1 (n4 / now)

                              :unit (y / year)))))
      :snt2 (r / report-01

                  :ARG1-of (ii / include-91

            :ARG1 (s / serve-01
                  :mod (p4 / poor))
            :time (t3 / travel-01

comment: I went on a codeshare flight in the summer . There are works going on in DXB and where the fly Dubai planes are kept , it s a long drive but nevertheless I think it s cos it s with Emirates , people expectations are high from before forgetting it s a budget carrier .
